titleStmt.title: The great case put home in some modest queries humbly proposed and tendered to consideration by a true lover of the Protestant religion and English loyalty.
titleStmt.author: True lover of the Protestant religion and English loyalty.

notesStmt.note: Discusses the possible succession of the Duke of York, later James II, as a Roman Catholic King.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
